layoutProperties.text:
If a TIN is unavailable please provide the appropriate reason A, B or C:

Reason A: The country where the Account Holder is liable to pay tax does not issue TINs to its residents

Reason B: The Account Holder is otherwise unable to obtain a TIN or equivalent number (Please explain why you are unable to obtain a TIN in the below table if you have selected this reason)

Reason C: No TIN is required. (Note. Only select this reason if the domestic law of the relevant jurisdiction does not require the collection of the TIN issued by such jurisdiction)

layoutProperties.text: U Microfinance Bank Limited, a Microfinance bank incorporated under the laws of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan and having its registered office at Plot # 13 – B, College Road, F-7 Markaz, Islamabad, Pakistan (hereinafter referred to as the “Bank” which expression shall mean and include its successors-in-interest, authorized representatives, agents and permitted assigns) of the OTHER PART.

I declare that I have submitted this Undertaking with the intention of opening a digital Core Account on the UBank Digital App with the Bank and that I have completed and submitted all necessary documentation in compliance with the policy standards of the Bank and that I have provided copies of the following documentation which are true to the best of my knowledge and belief and provide for an accurate representation in regards to my identity and being.

I further declare that I am the beneficial owner of the funds and have full controlling rights over the funds and that the source of funds have been gained through legal means, either as a source of employment or through the carrying out of a legal trade and/ or business.

I, hereby agree and provide my consent for my digital signature to be used for: (1) Account Opening Form and for any other documentation not listed herein, for which my digital signature is required for the processing and opening of the digital account.

I further confirm that the Account Opening Form, Terms & Conditions Form and Key Fact Statement have been received digitally through E-mail and all these forms/documents have been read, understood and accepted.


I hereby undertake, that I have disclosed all such information as is necessary for the opening of a digital account in my name and that I shall comply at all times, in case any further documentation is required by the Bank in relation to the digital account opening. I understand that in case any information/ documentation shared by me in relation to the account opening is found to be false or incorrect, the Bank shall have the right to suspend or terminate the Account and take any further action as may be applicable or required under law. I further agree and undertake that that where the Bank incurs any such loss as a result of any fraud, or incorrect information provided, I, the Customer shall indemnify the Bank against any loss, whether direct or indirect

Dear Customer,
Your request for UBank Core Banking
Account Opening has been received
successfully.Our Backend team will
perform standard verifications as per
bank's policy and shall revert to you
via Email/Phone as soon as possible.
Preferred City to Open a Bank Account

events.Comment: on Click Navigate to Otp Screen

attributes.title: Features Of Ba-Ikhtiar Current Account
attributes.text:
· Free IBFT facility

· Free SMS & email alerts

· No minimum balance required

· Free 1st Debit Card for initial
   deposit of PKR 5,000 or above

· Free 1st Cheque book with 25 leaves
   for initial deposit of PKR 500 or above

· Unlimited number of transactions

· Free UPaisa Account opening facility
   and online banking service

· Free permanent disability & accidental
   life Insurance

· Minimum account opening PKR 500

attributes.title: Proof Of Income Documents For Salaried
attributes.text:
• Latest Salary Slip, 

OR

 • Salary Certificate, 

OR

 • Payment Slips/ Record, 

OR

• Account Statement, 

OR

 • Tax Statement/ Return/Certificate,

OR

• For Retired Persons, an evidence of Terminal Benefits/ Pension Book etc., 

OR

 • Self-declaration (In case of ADA, ADRA and Freelancer Digital Account), 

OR

• Any other Document evidencing Source ofIncome

attributes.title: Proof Of Income Documents For Non Salaried
attributes.text:
• Receipt of Payment against the Work, 

OR

• Account Statement,

OR
 
• Particulars of Income/Funds Providers 
(e.g. Family Members/ Guardian/ Stipends/ Social Benefits etc.),

 OR
 
• Tax Statement/Return/Certificate,

 OR 

• Self-declaration (In case of ADA, ADRA and 
Freelancer Digital Account),

 OR

• Any other Document evidencing Source of Income

attributes.title: Proof Of Professional For Salaried
attributes.text:
• Valid Job/ Employee Card,

 OR

 • Employer/ Job Certificate, 

OR

 • Employment Contract,

 OR

 • Employer Letter, 

OR

 • Work Permit showing Profession/
 Employment Details,

 OR

 • For Retired Persons, a copy of
 Retirement Letter/ Proof of
 Retirement,

 OR

 • Self-declaration (In case of ADA,
 ADRA and Freelancer Digital Account),

 OR

• Any other Document evidencing the
 Profession

attributes.title: Proof Of Bussiness
attributes.text:
• Business/ Proprietor Letter Head;
or any other Proof of Self
Employment (e.g. Lawyer/ Doctor/
Consultant/Freelancers/ Grocery Store
/ Medical Store/ Labor Work etc.),

OR

 • Partnership/ Business Deed,

OR

• Self-employed or unemployed women 
 –Self-declaration, 

OR

 • Valid Student ID Card/ Letter from\n Educational Institute,

 OR

• Valid Work Permit showing Business/
 Nature of Work etc., 

OR

• Self-declaration (In case of ADA, ADRA
 and Freelancer Digital Account),

 OR

• Any other Document evidencing
 the Profession
